snippet.title: MK64 - Amped Up v.2.50 Test Version - *DOWNLOAD*
snippet.description:
The development is coming along great. Try out the latest test version! 
This update shouldn't crash on console anymore, so please give it a try, if you're able to!
Also, feedback is appreciated, as always!
Download from the archive:
https://mega.nz/folder/9BB32Cib#ISfFcu6hrF7CCl-2FTHaAA

Necessary:
- 8 MB memory / Expansion Pak
- Interpreter core on emulator

If you want to playtest my levels, join the Discord server to discuss, view progress and download new courses: https://discord.gg/NNkQSz9
Also check out the OverKart 64 channel, if you want to see more custom tracks and to get the recent news about MK64 modding: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxKsmdUQlAGeVMfpfy0D7gA

Links:
-Twitter: https://twitter.com/Litronom
-Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/Litronom/
-Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/litronom
-Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/litronom
